allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$env:STRATEGY_NAME=''''; $env:SCALPING_STOP_LOSS_PCT=''''; $env:SCALPING_TAKE_PROFIT_PCT=''''; python -c ''from config import Config; c = Config(); print(f""strategy_name: {c.strategy_name}""); print(f""scalping_stop_loss_pct: {c.scalping_stop_loss_pct}""); print(f""scalping_take_profit_pct: {c.scalping_take_profit_pct}"")''")
